data.title: Republican Party of Armenia
data.text:
Armenian Government Delegation Discuss Cooperation Prospects With IMF, World Bank Leadership In Washington

On Prime Minister Tigran Sargsyan’s instructions, an Armenian government delegation is in the United States to attend the Annual Conference of the International Monetary Fund (IMF) and the World Bank in Washington, DC. Minister-Chief of Government Staff Vache Gabrielyan, Minister of Finance David Sargsyan and Minister of Economy V. Avanesyan met with IMF and World Bank senior officials to discuss scheduled joint programs and their directions. The World Bank Group’s... more →

Tigran Sargsyan’s Congratulatory Message To Spanish Prime Minister Mariano Rajo

“Excellency, On behalf of the Government of the Republic of Armenia and myself, I congratulate you on the National Day of the Kingdom of Spain with my best wishes for progress, prosperity and development. Armenia seeks continued development of multifaceted ties with Spain in all areas of mutual interest. I am confident that together we can give a new quality to the Armenian- Spanish friendly relations and mutually beneficial cooperation for the welfare of our countries. ... more →

PM Attends Groundbreaking Ceremony For Srbots Targmanchats Church

Prime Minister Tigran Sargsyan attended today a groundbreaking ceremony for Srbots Targmanchats (Holy Translators) Church in AYB educational campus. The church is built on charitable funds. Construction is to be complete in two years. Conceived by architect Eric Ohanyan, the church is designed in the form of “people – books.” They are personalized “living books,” each of which represents one of the Holy Translators. The church building will symbolize... more →

"A better Yerevan": exhibition of the city economy in Main avenue

Within the frames of "Erebuni-Yerevan 2795" celebration and exposition of the city economy called "A better Yerevan" was organized in the segment between Mashtots avenue and Buzand street of Main avenue. The innovations installed in the city of Yerevan in 2013 and those to be installed in the nearest future were displayed there. The structures subordinated to the Municipality of Yerevan and some private organizations participated in the exposition. In separate... more →

Youth Organization of the Republican Party of Armenia granted nominal scholarships

On October 10 at the Central Office of the Republican Party of Armenia the solemn ceremony of granting annual nominal scholarships of the RPA Youth Organization took place. It has become a tradition to hold an intellectual contest among the excellent students of military educational and military-psychological institutions and the winners are granted nominal scholarships of Garegin Nzjdeh, Ashot Navasrdyan, Vazgen Sargsyan and Andranik Margaryan. This year the scholarships were granted... more →

RA NA Speaker Hovik Abrahamyan Meets with the Speaker of the IRI Majlis Ali Larijani in Geneva

On October 8 the 129th Assembly of the Inter-Parliamentary Union (IPU) continued its work, where the RA NA delegation led by the RA NA President Hovik Abrahamyan took part. Within the framework of the Assembly Hovik Abrahamyan had a meeting with the President of the Islamic Republic of Iran (IRI) Majlis Ali Larijani. In the course of the meeting, which was conducted in warm atmosphere, Hovik Abrahamyan and Ali Larijani documented that the Armenian-Iranian relations are at high level,... more →
